column5: yeah, i think that the reason the founders made it so hard to make amendments is because arguing is healthy for democracy when it's done. respectfully and people who are arguing the counterpoint often find flaws that need to be addressed. that doesn't mean the winners don't deserve to win but in the process it's helpful to troubleshoot which is what i see, what a lot of arguing really is about. so i think it's healthy to have to amend the constitution and it should be done the right way.
